name: Tapparoo
description:
A - Z, J, Alt, Space

Start/Pause - Enter

Movement - WASD, Arrow Keys

Gamepad and Mobile Supported!

A demake of a well known arcade game, eventually for use in the game Solar Surfer (also on my itch page)! Share your high scores below!

Made on stream over at https://www.twitch.tv/lebuh_

Link to my Discord! Come hang out or report any bugs here https://discord.gg/cUkFFFZ7UT
